page.shortlink: api a5 email filter builder function
page.description: Display a filter builder dialog for e-mail messages. Return filter
page.syntax: Filter as C = a5_email_filter_builder([C old_filter [,L headers_only ]])

argument.name: Filter
argument.description: A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and is suitable for use in EMAIL_POP_RETR_UI().

page.discussion: The A5_EMAIL_FILTER_BUILDER() function displays the Email Filter Genie.
